it's hard for me to classify sonic
forces it seems a bit anomalous in
nature there's a lot of new features
within it some of which work and most of
which do not but interestingly enough
despite its many flaws taking sonic
forces all the way through to its
completion might just be the most
satisfying way to experience the game if
you've played any other modern Sonic
game then you pretty much know what to
expect from Sonic forces there are a few
different main gameplay types that the
player cycles through over the course of
the campaign you've got your speedy 3d
sequences more exploratory 2d sections
and a potpourri of boss fights for good
measure but depending on your selected
level you'll have to play as either
modern Sonic Classic Sonic
the rookie avatar or a duo made up of
the rookie and modern Sonic each
character has a style all their own
thanks to their own signature moves such
as modern song it's homing attack and
classic Sonic's drop - but there's a ton

abilities first off you can choose from
seven different species of animal for
the base of your character each one with
their own signature abilities bird
possess a double jump whereas cats
retain some of their rings after they've
been hit while wolves passively draw
nearby rings towards them for the

know he's a gamer also because he has a

but lets you perform consecutive jumps
for its special ability and then there's
the lightning wisp and which is my

broken whip for its basic move and a
